title: aNUveDi vIzhndAlum
sahitya:
aNUveDi vIzhndAlum aghAyam sAindAlum accamillai haranE


anupallavi

  ninaivuDaluLLattE nIyinri nAnillai ninaivu nI kanavu nI nittiya vastuvE


caraNam    pancabhUta, un saTTaiyE uyarkkini parandAl verum kaTTaiyE nenjak-
kanavum ninaivum nIyanri nilaiyillAk-kAnal nIrE konjum ulagu 
siddhap-panjAramE ennaik-kollavum vellavum valladonrillaiyE
